pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Linden Lab Base[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/secondlife/python-llbase/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=GUB4VX1OSG)](https://codecov.io/gh/secondlife/python-llbase)Vintage python utility modules used by Linden Lab, the creators of[Second Life](https://secondlife.com).## UseInstall llbase:```pip install llbase```Use it:```pyfrom llbase.config import Configconfig = Config("./config.xml")print(config.get("my-setting"))```
